Extract URLs

Quickly extract all HTTP and HTTPS URLs from any text - perfect for analyzing content, gathering links, or cleaning up documentation

Example transformation:
Visit https://example.com and https://test.com for more information. https://example.com https://test.com
⌘K to search patterns
⌘↵ to transform text

Input

(⌘1 to focus)
0 characters

Output

(⌘2 to focus)
0 characters
No pattern selected

Select a pattern or enter custom regex above

Use ⌘K to find patterns

No pattern selected

Select a pattern or enter custom regex above

Use ⌘K to find patterns

Pattern Details

Search Pattern

(https?://[^\s,;!()]+)

Replace Pattern

$1

Example

Input

Visit https://example.com and https://test.com for more information.

Output

https://example.com
https://test.com

Tags

extractionurlweb

How to Use This Pattern

  1. Enter your text in the input area above
  2. Click "Transform" or press ⌘+Enter to apply the transformation
  3. Copy the result from the output area

You can also use the command palette (⌘K) to quickly switch between different patterns.

Find and extract all email addresses from any text content - ideal for data analysis, contact list building, or content scraping
